levelTypes.name: level_protect_barrier
levelTypes.description: level scrolls down constantly, player must pop all bubbles

levelTypes.name: level_collect_fish
levelTypes.description: player must release all the fish in bubbles

levelTypes.name: level_hatch_egg
levelTypes.description: player must crack the egg at the top

boostTypes.NOTE: Only one boost type per level, uses one of these 'name' values in a 'boost' item.

boostTypes.name: boost_extra_moves
boostTypes.description: automatic when boost is full, adds 5 shots to the counter

boostTypes.name: boost_convert_dragon
boostTypes.description: automatic when boost is full, flies across and turns bubbles into 'special' bubbles

boostTypes.name: boost_mine
boostTypes.description: large bomb must be fired by player instead of a bubble

boostTypes.name: boost_wild
boostTypes.description: wild card matching bubble, fired by player

boostTypes.name: boost_fireball
boostTypes.description: fireball fired by player, pops everything and slows down with distance until it fades

bubbleColours: NOTE: these are put into 'list' to describe the level bubble colours, fewer colours = easier levels

specialBubbles.name: special_bomb
specialBubbles.description: explode when hit, cause chain reactions with other bombs or rockets

specialBubbles.name: special_carry_dragon
specialBubbles.description: when bubble is popped they fly away, if bubble is dropped they carry it back into the grid

specialBubbles.name: special_rocket
specialBubbles.description: launch when hit, shoot left to right popping bubbles, stop on shell bubbles and detonate bombs

specialBubbles.name: special_frozen_bubble
specialBubbles.description: ice cracks when hit showing the colour bubble underneath, will stop rockets

specialBubbles.name: special_burst_dragon
specialBubbles.description: when bubble is popped they fly to another bubble and pop the whole colour group, if bubble is dropped they fly away

specialBubbles.NOTE0: all special bubble types are listed in an array called 'specials'

specialBubbles.NOTE1: 'number' is how many in the level at the start

specialBubbles.NOTE2: 'min' is the minimum distance in pixels from another one the same (scaled for bubbles with radius 16, diameter 32 pixels)

specialBubbles.NOTE3: 'max' is the maximum distance in pixels from another one of the same type

holesDescription: 'seed' is an optional random seed, you can use it to lock the random to a particular layout
